channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned tent & sleeping bag, 22nd September
item.description:
This is unused and has been in the Minister Churchyard Heritage site for more than two weeks. Please get Ubico to collect and dispose them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inappropriate Union Jack flags, 22nd September
item.description:
Along the Tewkesbury Road-been there for weeks now. CheltenhamBorough council have been contacted-they have apparently passed this to you. I do hope you will remove them asap-they are very distressing for some people.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
